home.title: Nuxt Starter Template
home.description: A production-ready starter template powered by Nuxt UI. Build beautiful, accessible, and performant applications in minutes, not hours.
home.featuresTitle: Everything you need to build modern Nuxt apps
home.featuresDescription: Start with a solid foundation. This template includes all the essentials for building production-ready applications with Nuxt UI's powerful component system.

productionReady.title: Production-ready from day one
productionReady.description: Pre-configured with TypeScript, ESLint, Tailwind CSS, and all the best practices. Focus on building features, not setting up tooling.

beautifulDefault.title: Beautiful by default
beautifulDefault.description: Leveraging Nuxt UI's design system with automatic dark mode, consistent spacing, and polished components that look great out of the box.

lightningFast.title: Lightning fast
lightningFast.description: Optimized for performance with SSR/SSG support, automatic code splitting, and edge-ready deployment. Your users will love the speed.

componentsIncluded.title: 100+ components included
componentsIncluded.description: Access Nuxt UI's comprehensive component library. From forms to navigation, everything is accessible, responsive, and customizable.

developerExperience.title: Developer experience first
developerExperience.description: Auto-imports, hot module replacement, and TypeScript support. Write less boilerplate and ship more features.

builtForScale.title: Built for scale
builtForScale.description: Enterprise-ready architecture with proper error handling, SEO optimization, and security best practices built-in.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.passwordDescription: Keep your account secure by using a strong password.
profile.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
profile.2FANotEnabled: Protect your account by enabling Two-Factor Authentication.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteAccountDesc: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

twoFactor.scanQrDesc: Scan QR code with your authenticator app.
twoFactor.enterCode: Enter 6-digit code from your app to verify.
twoFactor.passwordDesc: To complete 2FA setup, please enter your current password to verify your identity.

disableTwoFactor.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disableTwoFactor.description: Please confirm your password to disable two-factor authentication.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.warning: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently lost.

toasts.accountDeleted: Your account has been successfully deleted. Goodbye.

errors.incorrectCurrentPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect.
errors.serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again later.

logto.password__rejected: Password does not meet the requirements.
logto.password_rejected__too_short: Password is too short. It must be at least 8 characters.
logto.password_rejected__character_types: Password must include a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
logto.password_rejected__pwned: This password has been found in a data breach. Please choose a different, more secure password.
logto.password_rejected__restricted_found: Password contains restricted words. Please choose a different one.
logto.password_rejected__sequential_chars: Password contains too many sequential characters (e.g., 1234, abcd).
logto.password_rejected__repeated_chars: Password contains too many repeated characters (e.g., aaaa).
logto.password_rejected__user_info: Password should not contain your personal information (name, email, etc.).
logto.session__verification_session_not_found: Verification session expired. Please try again.
logto.session__verification_failed: The current password you entered is incorrect.
logto.verification_record__not_found: Verification failed. Please enter your current password.
logto.user__same_password: New password cannot be the same as your old password.
logto.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
